input.sentences: the show we saw when we were on vacation was great .
there were so many disney tales being told on stage .
afterward they all got up together for an encore .
we all had a great time there .
output.sentences: People are putting on a grand ice skating performance at Disneyland.
Several different characters from different Disney movies and shows dance together to music as the colors and lights change.
Some of the scenes to the perofmance are dark and dramatic, featuring evil characters and spooky decorations.
Wizard Mickey Mouse skates into the scene and saves the day with his magic powers.
The battle is over and Mini Mouse sings about how relieved she is that all her friends are okay.
